programme.desc: A look back at the 2011/12 Barclays Premier League season. The title race was an all-Manchester affair as neighbours City and United battled for the trophy. Elsewhere, there was another great escape at the foot of the table and a dramatic revival in the fortunes of one of the league's biggest clubs.
